description: Try our easy to follow Whisky-Glazed Steaks recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Whisky-Glazed Steaks Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 orange, rind finely grated, and 1/3 cup juice

recipeInstructions.text: Place whisky, sugar, rind, juice, sauce, mustard and celery salt in a small pan over medium heat. Stir until mixture comes to the boil. Simmer for 10 minutes or until slightly thickened.

Preheat a chargrill over medium-high heat. Add steaks and cook for 3 minutes each side for medium rare or until cooked to your liking. Spoon about 2 tbs of the sauce over sizzling steaks to glaze. Serve with extra sauce and a green salad.
